description: Experimenting with large language models and a new way to write code. Most of the time is spent developing web apps, mobile apps, and other software.
Rookie is a startup that I co-founded with a buddy of mine, we are currently in the pre-seed round of funding. We are building smart sporting goods that track and analyze how you play the game.

A functioning Boys and Girls Club youth program generator that uses an in house LLM along with a custom API to generate programs for the youth. Proof of concept for now but will be running as a standalone app for the Boys and Girls Club soon.
IT assistant for the USA branch. Paid for 6 Google IT Certifications. Really cool things these guys are doing, please check them out!

Found my passion for computers and technology here. I worked in the computer department and was responsible for helping customers with their computer needs. I also built custom computers for customers.
First person in my lineage to graduate from an American school, 3.8 GPA. I was the president of the Computer Science Club and the president of the Muslim Student Association.
